name: insomnia-plugin-hmac-makaira

insomnia.name: hmac-makaira
insomnia.displayName: HMAC with nonce and secret from payload plugin
insomnia.description: Generate an HMAC on the req. body with nonce and secret. Based on Benjamin LETELLIER plugin: insomnia-plugin-request-body-hmac-query-string

author: Tom
description: I just changed Benjamin LETELLIER plugin (insomnia-plugin-request-body-hmac-query-string) to work with Makaira API.
